artist: artist: Vivika Heino; artist: Otto Heino
creditline: Gift of Tamara and Michael Root
description: large round bowl with straight sides and tapered foot; sides decorated with 6 large protrusions that correspond to indentations on interior; mottled gray and reddish-brown glaze on exterior; mottled reddish-brown and black on interior
signed: incised at center of base: Vivika / + / Otto
title: Bowl
